.. py:class:: PostGISIntrospection

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.db.backends.postgresql.introspection.DatabaseIntrospection`


   .. py:attribute:: postgis_oid_lookup


   .. py:attribute:: ignored_tables


   .. py:method:: get_field_type(data_type, description)


   .. py:method:: get_geometry_type(table_name, description)

      The geometry type OID used by PostGIS does not indicate the particular
      type of field that a geometry column is (e.g., whether it's a
      PointField or a PolygonField).  Thus, this routine queries the PostGIS
      metadata tables to determine the geometry type.
